Authentication & Authorization

async app.routers.auth.login(user_data: LoginRequest, response: Response, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Authenticate a user with email+password. - Sets both access_token and refresh_token in HttpOnly cookies.

async app.routers.auth.logout(response: Response, user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Log out the current user by clearing their cookies.

async app.routers.auth.refresh_token(request: Request)[source]

Refresh an access token using a valid refresh token cookie.

Parameters:

request (Request) – FastAPI request (to read cookies).

Raises:

HTTPException(401) – If the refresh token is missing or invalid.

Returns:

New access_token (and same refresh_token) in body and cookie.

Return type:

JSONResponse

async app.routers.auth.request_password_reset(data: PasswordResetRequest, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Send a one‑hour password reset link to the given email.

Parameters:

  • data (PasswordResetRequest) – Contains the user’s email.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session.

Raises:

HTTPException(404) – If no user is found.

Returns:

{ “message”: “Password reset link sent” }

Return type:

dict

async app.routers.auth.resend_verification(request: EmailRequest, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Resend the email verification link to a user.

Parameters:

  • request (EmailRequest) – Contains the user’s email.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session injected by FastAPI.

Raises:

  • HTTPException(404) – If no user exists with that email.

  • HTTPException(400) – If the user is already verified.

Returns:

{ “msg”: “Verification email resent” }

Return type:

dict

async app.routers.auth.reset_password(data: PasswordResetConfirm, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Consume a password‑reset token and change the user’s password.

Parameters:

  • data (PasswordResetConfirm) –

    • email: user’s email

    • token: reset token from email

    • new_password/confirm_password: new credentials

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session.

Raises:

  • HTTPException(400) – If the passwords don’t match, token is invalid/expired, or email mismatch.

  • HTTPException(404) – If user not found.

Returns:

{ “message”: “Password changed successfully” }

Return type:

dict

async app.routers.auth.show_reset_password_info(token: str)[source]

Informational endpoint for password‑reset tokens.

Parameters:

token (str) – The reset token.

Returns:

Shows where/how to POST the token in a curl or browser.

Return type:

HTMLResponse

async app.routers.auth.signup(user_data: UserCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Register a new user.

  1. Checks for existing email/username.

  2. Creates user with is_verified=False.

  3. Sends verification email.

async app.routers.auth.verify_email(token: str, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Verify a user’s email via token-link in their inbox. Returns a simple HTML “success” or “failure” page.
